data.what_is:
Thryv is a do-it-all business management software that helps you streamline your business so you can get back to the things you love. Small business owners communicate better, solve more business challenges and get more organized with Thryv. 

Partner with Thryv to surpass your customers' expectations and fortify your online presence, all from a single login. Thryv includes our best-in-class support, available anytime, 24/7, with experts who understand the goals and unique needs of small business owners.

Thryv handles:
 * Customer communications
 * Estimates, invoicing and payments
 * Appointment scheduling
 * Reputation management
 * Social media management
 * and more!

Thryv's award-winning software is helping over 55,000 businesses across the U.S., Canada and Australia transform how they do business and manage their customers.

Thryv automates tasks and puts customers at the center of your business, with one easy-to-use software, making it easy to reach more customers, stay organized, get paid faster and automatically generate reviews.

Thryv makes it easy for customers to:
 * Find you online through ratings and reviews, social presence and accurate search results.
 * Interact easily and instantly, receive reminders, send texts and emails and schedule appointments.
 * Pay you effortlessly, receive receipts instantly, know it's safe and secure and choose how to pay.
 * Stay engaged with automated messages that ask them back, stay in touch and request reviews.

Thryv's award-winning software is helping over 45,000 businesses across the US, Canada and Australia transform how they do business and manage their customers.
data.product_description: Thryv is simple small software to help small businesses manage their time, communicate with clients, and get paid.Thryv helps business owners transform how they do business and manage their customers with an end-to-end client experience platform. Unlike our competitors, we're here to help along the way, including training and 24/7 support with local business specialists. Thryv is fully mobile and has an award-winning, brilliantly intuitive interface. Thryv is one of the only platforms in the market that helps your business get found, get chosen, get paid, and get credit all in a single platform.

features.content: Based on 84 Thryv reviews. Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

initial_reviews.review_title: All in one business command center
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
Great customer support!  They assign you a business manager right away to make sure you get everything you want out of the system. Set up time to chat on Zoom to walk you through spots that you need help.  Adjust anything on the back end to make sure it is working properly before the call ends.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
Before I talked to anyone, I downloaded my gmail to the system.  I highly recommend to clean up your emails and any promotional emails before inporting as they all come along.  I deleted the connection, cleaned up my inboxes and then reconnect.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
The phone number they offer - I would like to answer/make calls without being open in the app on my mobile phone.  I don't need it running all the time in the background of phone just to get a call. Maybe when I get a larger clientele base.  It's set up for a desktop, which I don't sit at my desk all the time.
I love it that they keep me in the loop of working on the solution.  Most companies just leave you hanging, not knowing if they are really working on it or not.

initial_reviews.review_title: Amazing customer support, great product!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
I love how easy it is to use, I was able to set up a lot of things before my meeting with the support team. Everyone was very transparent with me about what the program can and can't do so there were no surprises when we purchased the program. I like how the program integrates with all of our social media. My favorite thing about Thryv is that every person that works for the comany that I have spoken to truly cares about our goals for the company and wants to help us achieve them.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
My only complaint so far is that they do not have a way for clients to sign documents remotely.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Thryv allows me to make clients aware of court dates, and what room their hearing will be in. We get several calls per day from clients asking what time their hearing is or what room it will be in, which takes up a lot of my time.

Thryv also helps us with client communication and document management.

I am a full time legal assistant but I am also in charge of all of the social media for the firm. Thryv helps me create and schedule social media posts across all of our platforms, it even has AI features so it can create posts for me! Thryv has cut down on the time I spend making posts and posting them, as well as replying to our reviews online.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great Product - A boat load under the hood
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
I'm a relaitvely new user so, the best thing I like about it so far is how intuitive the workflows and buttonology are tied together.  There is some very obvious consideration given to how a small business owner, marketing, or operational teams may use the platform.
Additionally, it's fairly robust, allowing for a large bulk of disperate work to be condensed into much more manageable tasks.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
Repetitive Redundant Duplicities.  While there are areas to include standard business information, webpage, phone number, etc., there are far too may times the same information gets asked for in other modules or fields.  Not that big of a deal until you change an address or a number.  Then, it's a hunt to find where each field actually lives so it can be edited.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Aggregation of capabilities.  Having everything in one platform has been a huge time saver.

initial_reviews.review_title: A decent CRM software thats good for small businesses
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
There are a lot of CRM software available nowadays. There are strong ones out there that are either purpose built for certain industries or have an insane amount of customization, or really deep granularity in how it operates. Thryv is definitely designed as a more general purpose software, but that is perfectly fine in this day and age where sometimes too much can be just that, too much.  A big hit compared to those programs is the affordability of Thryv, which makes it much more ideal for smaller businesses who don't have the millions of dollars of revenue to justify those big purchases, some of which are per each user. For us, the affordable price that covers all the users we need is great. Its easy to use, I like the feature of the teams chat built into Thryv directly which makes it easy for the whole team to catch up on things that are going on if someone is not in the office. Integration of the social media directly into the system is rather nice. Also at the end of the day, its super easy to use every day.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
The app needs some optimization. When you're in the field and need to access someones customer card for information or to upload something or to take a payment, it needs to be quick and seamless. Currently the app can be slow but overall is still does a good job of providing the information needed.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Customer relations management. Its benefitting us by making everything centralized and accessible from anywhere.

initial_reviews.review_title: I am very pleased.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
I love the support I get when needed. When I first signed up for Thryv, I had Zoom calls with a support person who walked me through the software and helped me set up my business. I have support via email, phone, and chat. I have used their support when I do not understand something and they have been very responsive, professional, and helpful.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
It is a lot to digest, but the support makes up for that.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Thryv helps me automate my social media and online scheduling. I love only having to go to one place to post and respond to all social. I love being able to send all my clients a personalized email at the same time. I love being able to have my calendar and schedule all in the same place as all the other daily administrative responsibilities I do. It keeps me organized and sane.

initial_reviews.review_title: Thank you to Chelsea Dingus at Thryv
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
We are a new customer to the Thryv experience.  Our onboarding process for both the website build and the Social Media has been a positive experience.  However, there is an individual who has been a strong Thryv component of our customer success with the social media platform.  That is Chelsea Dingus.
She has been so informative, supportive and encouraging for us to expand with in the Thryv platform to enhance our business experience.  However, though, not all went smoothly, and not due to any fault of Thryv, but in any instance, Chelsea was calming, encouraging and patient in the education of new processes to ensure we understood and were comfortable to keep adding building blocks to our own Thryv Success.
Another shout out is to Nick Peiffer!  We have been in conversations for over a year and a half before taking the leap to Thryv with a strong sense of trust with Nick and what Thryv can do for us as a business.  Our calls didnt ever feel like a sales call but more of a friend interested in learning about our business and our business challenges, etc.  He perservered many calls and conversations to prove and he did prove to us how successful Thryv is with other companies and challenging our current vendors with what he knew Thryv could do.  The customer service from this company is amazing to me.  Though, I think we expect it, you dont see it often, and certainly not as consistently as we have experiences.  Thank you NIck!!!

What do you dislike about Thryv?
I have not had one negative experience while onboarding with Thryv.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Managing all marketing and online presence needs under one umbrella and in one easy to use portal.

initial_reviews.review_title: Fewer repetitive acts
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
The primary reason I signed up for Thryv is so that I could consolidate my social media presence into one place and control it with a single command center. We also get a pretty kick a** CRM and ThryvPay feature (which makes me look more slick as a business), among other great features. Finally, they helped solve my verification nightmare with Google, which had marked my [web-based] business as "permanently closed" when I simply moved to a different town.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
This isn't actually a downside, but I understand Thryv has been around for quite some time. I wish I had known about them earlier so I could have taken advantage of their many benefits. I don't know if the answer is more marketing or if they like being a "best kept secret."

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am on track to book four weddings per month instead of two. That's a great ROI.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
Thryv.com offers an uncomplicated interface that stands out in the crowded CRM market. They delivered a well constructed website, that is not only visually appealing but also user friendly. I especially like how I can get into the website and make changes to it when I need to.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
There is no real lead pipeline. Clients can be sorted using tags and client contact information but this is not prefered.

There are features (like automated marking campaigns) that are not tracked on the client cards, which is a minor inconvenience when following up with leads/prospects/clients and knowing what marketing they have received.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Whether I need to update client information, tweak marketing strategies, update my website or manage appointments, Thryv.com provides the flexibility and control I need, precisely when I need it.

Social media posts are controled and stored in one location.

initial_reviews.review_title: Pretty Solid Product
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
I like the ease of managing your primary marketing tools in one place. The website and social editing features are very easy to use. I'm not familiar with most website software systems, so I love that Thryv has a very simple tool to make changes to both the mobile and web version of our company site. I also like that you can schedule social posts for all of your platforms at once. In addition, any time I've had an issue, the customer support chat feature has quickly and easily fixed my problems. I use this product daily and I'm glad that we have it in our office.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
The new social media dashboard has made it more difficult to implement, but I'm sure it will get better as I learn how to use it. I feel as though it was thrust upon us quickly. I also feel that there are some features missing from the social scheduling, such as an easier way to readjust photo sizing.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Time spent posting content, time spent editing website, and being able to do more marketing in-house versus using an agency.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
Thryv provided a knowledgable Success Manager (Crista) to help me get set with all of my marketing needs.  The Business Advisor, Jacob Thompson, has been extremely supportive and has gone above and beyond to help me in getting exactly what I need for my business development.

initial_reviews.review_title: We are moving to another service
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
- The social media posting and management
- Being able to embed the service booking feature on your site
- Texting and emailing from one space
- RingCentral integration
- Listings management

What do you dislike about Thryv?
- The Facebook messenger integration is not useful, we ended up disabling the feature after it chased off more leads than it nurtured.
- Support is not as responsive or helpful as they claim. Regularly am told they will email me back with a solution only to hear nothing from them.
- Leads management is not intuitive and have had trouble training people how to use it properly unless they are younger and tech friendly.
- Zapier integration is lacking when it comes to talking to other systems and what triggers you can use.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
We chose THRYV as the sales CRM for our remodeling company. It has helped us build up our social media following as well as add the service scheduling feature to our website. The marketing automation has helped us get more reviews and launch new specials. But due to a lot of issues with how the software operates and how lacking we have found the support we have decided to move on to another CRM. The SMS feature has been down for over a week and support can't tell me why, other than it was something they did, or how long it will be down. This is the type of support you can expect.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great tool for all your marketing and CRM needs for a small business.
initial_reviews.review_content:

We have been using the Thryv tool for a little over 2 years and we really like it.  It offers a central location to manage marketing, client information, invoicing, forms, document signature and more.   We are able to control a lot of the social media and marketing content that is sent out.  It is user friendly site and has a lot of tools to make it easy for businesses.  The custom support is helpful, as well as the online support Q&A.  We feel we are getting more leads than we had before, which we attribute to Thryv tool.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
I dislike that we don't use all the functionality that the tool has to offer.  We have other applications that we use for billing and have not integrated it together.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
The Thryv tool handles our marketing needs the most.  We have seen our leads increase since using the application.  We know we can take steps to increase the number of leads, but need to make sure we are able to handle the volume.

initial_reviews.review_title: Thryv is more than just another CRM. It's the best decision you'll make for your business.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
Thyrv keeps the daily pulse of our operations. BT (Before Thryv), the company schedule and customer communication was flying by the seat of its pants.

Thryv's platform allows you to customize communication and scheduling in a way that other CRMs are too rigid. It allows the business to maintain its culture, communication, and branding, while gaining a superpower in streamlining scheduling, communication, and documentation.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
"What do you dislike about Thryv?" Is that even a real question? You cannot dislike this company or platform since their customer support is out of this world. Their response time is ALWAYS less than 2 business days. They actively review real customer feedback and ACTUALLY implement it on their platform every few months. They are so in tune with their platform, that new features appear that I didn't even know I needed, and now use every day.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Thryv supports our daily communication with customers, scheduling, document sharing & signing, and social media management.

initial_reviews.review_title: Game Changer for Business Owners
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
I am thrilled to share my experience with Thryv, a platform that has truly transformed the way I manage my business at Pleasant Leadership Consulting. As the CEO and Founder, efficiency and seamless operations are paramount, and Thryv has exceeded my expectations in more ways than one.

First and foremost, the synchronized calendar feature has been an absolute game-changer. The ability for clients to book appointments 24/7, coupled with the system's automatic availability checks, ensures that my schedule remains organized and streamlined. The instant notifications for each booking are invaluable, allowing me to stay on top of my commitments effortlessly.

Managing finances is a breeze with Thryv's user-friendly invoicing tools. Creating and sending invoices has never been easier, saving me valuable time that I can now redirect towards more strategic aspects of my business. The platform's intuitive interface makes the entire process seamless, from initiation to payment receipt.

One standout feature that has significantly lightened my workload is Thryv's auto-billing functionality. As a business owner with numerous responsibilities, having a system that takes care of recurring billing automatically is a godsend. It's a relief to remove one more task from my busy to-do list, allowing me to focus on what matters most - providing exceptional leadership coaching and business consulting.

In conclusion, Thryv has become an indispensable tool for Pleasant Leadership Consulting, enhancing efficiency and simplifying key aspects of our operations. If you're a business owner looking for a comprehensive solution that truly understands your needs, Thryv is the answer. Highly recommended!

What do you dislike about Thryv?
Pricing is steep and should be used on the number of employees.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Instead of conducting multiple tasks solo, or outsourcing at a steep price, I am able to roll services into Thryv to protect my time and expenditures.

all_reviews.review_title: All in one business command center
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
Great customer support!  They assign you a business manager right away to make sure you get everything you want out of the system. Set up time to chat on Zoom to walk you through spots that you need help.  Adjust anything on the back end to make sure it is working properly before the call ends.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
Before I talked to anyone, I downloaded my gmail to the system.  I highly recommend to clean up your emails and any promotional emails before inporting as they all come along.  I deleted the connection, cleaned up my inboxes and then reconnect.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
The phone number they offer - I would like to answer/make calls without being open in the app on my mobile phone.  I don't need it running all the time in the background of phone just to get a call. Maybe when I get a larger clientele base.  It's set up for a desktop, which I don't sit at my desk all the time.
I love it that they keep me in the loop of working on the solution.  Most companies just leave you hanging, not knowing if they are really working on it or not.

I'm a relaitvely new user so, the best thing I like about it so far is how intuitive the workflows and buttonology are tied together.  There is some very obvious consideration given to how a small business owner, marketing, or operational teams may use the platform.
Additionally, it's fairly robust, allowing for a large bulk of disperate work to be condensed into much more manageable tasks.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
Repetitive Redundant Duplicities.  While there are areas to include standard business information, webpage, phone number, etc., there are far too may times the same information gets asked for in other modules or fields.  Not that big of a deal until you change an address or a number.  Then, it's a hunt to find where each field actually lives so it can be edited.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Aggregation of capabilities.  Having everything in one platform has been a huge time saver.

The AI caption generator is a game changer and find myself frequently using it in order to implement some of it's witty remarks in real life conversations.

review_question_answers.answer: Wish I had a higher budget in order to purchase more packages!

review_question_answers.answer: I am so happy to have one system that takes care of everything from CRM, social media, to payments in one easy to use system.

all_reviews.review_title: A decent CRM software thats good for small businesses
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
There are a lot of CRM software available nowadays. There are strong ones out there that are either purpose built for certain industries or have an insane amount of customization, or really deep granularity in how it operates. Thryv is definitely designed as a more general purpose software, but that is perfectly fine in this day and age where sometimes too much can be just that, too much.  A big hit compared to those programs is the affordability of Thryv, which makes it much more ideal for smaller businesses who don't have the millions of dollars of revenue to justify those big purchases, some of which are per each user. For us, the affordable price that covers all the users we need is great. Its easy to use, I like the feature of the teams chat built into Thryv directly which makes it easy for the whole team to catch up on things that are going on if someone is not in the office. Integration of the social media directly into the system is rather nice. Also at the end of the day, its super easy to use every day.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
The app needs some optimization. When you're in the field and need to access someones customer card for information or to upload something or to take a payment, it needs to be quick and seamless. Currently the app can be slow but overall is still does a good job of providing the information needed.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Customer relations management. Its benefitting us by making everything centralized and accessible from anywhere.

all_reviews.review_content:

I love the support I get when needed. When I first signed up for Thryv, I had Zoom calls with a support person who walked me through the software and helped me set up my business. I have support via email, phone, and chat. I have used their support when I do not understand something and they have been very responsive, professional, and helpful.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
It is a lot to digest, but the support makes up for that.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Thryv helps me automate my social media and online scheduling. I love only having to go to one place to post and respond to all social. I love being able to send all my clients a personalized email at the same time. I love being able to have my calendar and schedule all in the same place as all the other daily administrative responsibilities I do. It keeps me organized and sane.

all_reviews.review_title: Thank you to Chelsea Dingus at Thryv
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
We are a new customer to the Thryv experience.  Our onboarding process for both the website build and the Social Media has been a positive experience.  However, there is an individual who has been a strong Thryv component of our customer success with the social media platform.  That is Chelsea Dingus.
She has been so informative, supportive and encouraging for us to expand with in the Thryv platform to enhance our business experience.  However, though, not all went smoothly, and not due to any fault of Thryv, but in any instance, Chelsea was calming, encouraging and patient in the education of new processes to ensure we understood and were comfortable to keep adding building blocks to our own Thryv Success.
Another shout out is to Nick Peiffer!  We have been in conversations for over a year and a half before taking the leap to Thryv with a strong sense of trust with Nick and what Thryv can do for us as a business.  Our calls didnt ever feel like a sales call but more of a friend interested in learning about our business and our business challenges, etc.  He perservered many calls and conversations to prove and he did prove to us how successful Thryv is with other companies and challenging our current vendors with what he knew Thryv could do.  The customer service from this company is amazing to me.  Though, I think we expect it, you dont see it often, and certainly not as consistently as we have experiences.  Thank you NIck!!!

What do you dislike about Thryv?
I have not had one negative experience while onboarding with Thryv.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Managing all marketing and online presence needs under one umbrella and in one easy to use portal.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
The primary reason I signed up for Thryv is so that I could consolidate my social media presence into one place and control it with a single command center. We also get a pretty kick a** CRM and ThryvPay feature (which makes me look more slick as a business), among other great features. Finally, they helped solve my verification nightmare with Google, which had marked my [web-based] business as "permanently closed" when I simply moved to a different town.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
This isn't actually a downside, but I understand Thryv has been around for quite some time. I wish I had known about them earlier so I could have taken advantage of their many benefits. I don't know if the answer is more marketing or if they like being a "best kept secret."

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am on track to book four weddings per month instead of two. That's a great ROI.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
Thryv.com offers an uncomplicated interface that stands out in the crowded CRM market. They delivered a well constructed website, that is not only visually appealing but also user friendly. I especially like how I can get into the website and make changes to it when I need to.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
There is no real lead pipeline. Clients can be sorted using tags and client contact information but this is not prefered.

There are features (like automated marking campaigns) that are not tracked on the client cards, which is a minor inconvenience when following up with leads/prospects/clients and knowing what marketing they have received.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Whether I need to update client information, tweak marketing strategies, update my website or manage appointments, Thryv.com provides the flexibility and control I need, precisely when I need it.

Social media posts are controled and stored in one location.

The thing that I like most about Thryv is the complete intergration of all my different systems and pay into one platform. It cuts down on the management time and allows we to focus more on business. I also really enjoy having a local rep who I can contact at any moment to get help or connected with someone who can help me.

What do you dislike about Thryv?

all_reviews.review_content:

I love all the features that come with Thryv and the ease of using this platform. The support is amazing, from your personal support member in your local area. Weekly calls to show you how to use the platform is beyond what I expected.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
There is nothing that I have disliked about Thryv yet.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Keeping communication from many platforms is a heaven sent. Separating your contacts into relevant groups to make sure you are sending the correct communication based on their grouping is a life and time saver. There are so many other features that I am just now diving into and know this platform is going to be everything I need.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
I like the ease of managing your primary marketing tools in one place. The website and social editing features are very easy to use. I'm not familiar with most website software systems, so I love that Thryv has a very simple tool to make changes to both the mobile and web version of our company site. I also like that you can schedule social posts for all of your platforms at once. In addition, any time I've had an issue, the customer support chat feature has quickly and easily fixed my problems. I use this product daily and I'm glad that we have it in our office.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
The new social media dashboard has made it more difficult to implement, but I'm sure it will get better as I learn how to use it. I feel as though it was thrust upon us quickly. I also feel that there are some features missing from the social scheduling, such as an easier way to readjust photo sizing.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Time spent posting content, time spent editing website, and being able to do more marketing in-house versus using an agency.

all_reviews.review_title: We are moving to another service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
- The social media posting and management
- Being able to embed the service booking feature on your site
- Texting and emailing from one space
- RingCentral integration
- Listings management

What do you dislike about Thryv?
- The Facebook messenger integration is not useful, we ended up disabling the feature after it chased off more leads than it nurtured.
- Support is not as responsive or helpful as they claim. Regularly am told they will email me back with a solution only to hear nothing from them.
- Leads management is not intuitive and have had trouble training people how to use it properly unless they are younger and tech friendly.
- Zapier integration is lacking when it comes to talking to other systems and what triggers you can use.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
We chose THRYV as the sales CRM for our remodeling company. It has helped us build up our social media following as well as add the service scheduling feature to our website. The marketing automation has helped us get more reviews and launch new specials. But due to a lot of issues with how the software operates and how lacking we have found the support we have decided to move on to another CRM. The SMS feature has been down for over a week and support can't tell me why, other than it was something they did, or how long it will be down. This is the type of support you can expect.

- RingCentral integration
- Listings management

- The Facebook messenger integration is not useful, we ended up disabling the feature after it chased off more leads than it nurtured.
- Support is not as responsive or helpful as they claim. Regularly am told they will email me back with a solution only to hear nothing from them.
- Leads management is not intuitive and have had trouble training people how to use it properly unless they are younger and tech friendly.
- Zapier integration is lacking when it comes to talking to other systems and what triggers you can use.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We chose THRYV as the sales CRM for our remodeling company. It has helped us build up our social media following as well as add the service scheduling feature to our website. The marketing automation has helped us get more reviews and launch new specials. But due to a lot of issues with how the software operates and how lacking we have found the support we have decided to move on to another CRM. The SMS feature has been down for over a week and support can't tell me why, other than it was something they did, or how long it will be down. This is the type of support you can expect.

all_reviews.review_title: Great tool for all your marketing and CRM needs for a small business.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
We have been using the Thryv tool for a little over 2 years and we really like it.  It offers a central location to manage marketing, client information, invoicing, forms, document signature and more.   We are able to control a lot of the social media and marketing content that is sent out.  It is user friendly site and has a lot of tools to make it easy for businesses.  The custom support is helpful, as well as the online support Q&A.  We feel we are getting more leads than we had before, which we attribute to Thryv tool.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
I dislike that we don't use all the functionality that the tool has to offer.  We have other applications that we use for billing and have not integrated it together.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
The Thryv tool handles our marketing needs the most.  We have seen our leads increase since using the application.  We know we can take steps to increase the number of leads, but need to make sure we are able to handle the volume.

Thyrv keeps the daily pulse of our operations. BT (Before Thryv), the company schedule and customer communication was flying by the seat of its pants.

"What do you dislike about Thryv?" Is that even a real question? You cannot dislike this company or platform since their customer support is out of this world. Their response time is ALWAYS less than 2 business days. They actively review real customer feedback and ACTUALLY implement it on their platform every few months. They are so in tune with their platform, that new features appear that I didn't even know I needed, and now use every day.

Thryv supports our daily communication with customers, scheduling, document sharing & signing, and social media management.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
I am thrilled to share my experience with Thryv, a platform that has truly transformed the way I manage my business at Pleasant Leadership Consulting. As the CEO and Founder, efficiency and seamless operations are paramount, and Thryv has exceeded my expectations in more ways than one.

First and foremost, the synchronized calendar feature has been an absolute game-changer. The ability for clients to book appointments 24/7, coupled with the system's automatic availability checks, ensures that my schedule remains organized and streamlined. The instant notifications for each booking are invaluable, allowing me to stay on top of my commitments effortlessly.

Managing finances is a breeze with Thryv's user-friendly invoicing tools. Creating and sending invoices has never been easier, saving me valuable time that I can now redirect towards more strategic aspects of my business. The platform's intuitive interface makes the entire process seamless, from initiation to payment receipt.

One standout feature that has significantly lightened my workload is Thryv's auto-billing functionality. As a business owner with numerous responsibilities, having a system that takes care of recurring billing automatically is a godsend. It's a relief to remove one more task from my busy to-do list, allowing me to focus on what matters most - providing exceptional leadership coaching and business consulting.

In conclusion, Thryv has become an indispensable tool for Pleasant Leadership Consulting, enhancing efficiency and simplifying key aspects of our operations. If you're a business owner looking for a comprehensive solution that truly understands your needs, Thryv is the answer. Highly recommended!

What do you dislike about Thryv?
Pricing is steep and should be used on the number of employees.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Instead of conducting multiple tasks solo, or outsourcing at a steep price, I am able to roll services into Thryv to protect my time and expenditures.

all_reviews.review_content:

Thryv is a great overall tool which is very easy to use and understand to help you manage your customers as a CRM for managing appointments, quotes, billing, and integration to your financial system (in my case Quickbooks).  The CRM functionality is strong for a small business and continues to add features and provide integrations such as Outlook and other to help connect all of your systems in one platform.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
While Thryv continues to add features, I would like to see them gain ground from a sales perspective in helping you manage your pipeline.  For example, to forecast opportunities for a given time period, understanding overall sales pipeline, managing multiple opportunities on an account, etc.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Managing customer appointments, quotes, orders, billing

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
Thryv truly give businesses all the tools they need in one place. While it takes some practice, the Thryv support and staff are incredibly helpful. The onboarding process was extensive and personalized.

As I said, you are given ALL of the tools - not all are necessary. For our painting business, there were some features we simply did not need. For example, we did not want to run all of oyr billing through Thryv. Not because it is a bad system, but because the way we run our business does not need it. The moral of the story is I love how you have all the tools, but the system doesn't make things more difficult if you choose not to use one.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
While it has not been my main focus, the social media tab could be better. I love being able to schedule post all in one spot, but it doesn't always integrate well within the apps. For example, some limit multiple pictures and more apps could be listed. Not a deal breaker at all!

Having all of the tools at once can be intimidating... it is a great system and the onboarding process is extremely helpful; however, I think businesses have to come into Thryv knowing their pain points and what they NEED first. This issue is not on Thryv directly. If businesses have a better idea on what they need from the software as opposed to setting up ALL the features during onboarding, then I think it will be easier for the users. I was able to dedicate my full time to this - not all people who need Thryv will have that luxary. Focusing on immediate results in important areas first would increase efficiency, engagement and retention. Layer on more learning sessions after that point.

Again nothing negative about my experience - this is just an idea that I hope helps get people that are on the fence fully on board!

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Thryv's biggest strenght for us is the website. Specifically, the websites ease of use. Having the Thryv team build the site is great, but what is even better is being able to go in and edit things myself. If I have questions, I just watch videos or reach out to support!

Tremendous help to growing our online reputation and playforms.

all_reviews.review_title: Thryv is an ideal CRM and marketing platform for small/midsize business owners!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
Thryv has an easy to use interface and strong functionality to automate many processes for small businesses. Particular strengths are the ability to manage the consistency of online business listings to 40+ sites, an easy platform for managing social media posts and online reviews, and to generate estimates/proposals to obtain new clients. The unlimited package also includes excellent services, including website design, social media posts, and (most impressively) a package of professionally produced videos for posting on your website and social media. All of this for a very affordable monthly price.

I also like the integration with several payment platforms, including their own (ThryvPay), which worked well for me after some initial configuration issues.

Finally, the online support feature has been great. Any time of the day or night, I have gotten excellent support through the built-in chat feature. In fact, all of the staff I've met through Thryv have been extremely professional and supportive. Highly recommended!

What do you dislike about Thryv?
While I think Thryv is great overall, I do think that there are some missing features that prevent me from considering this a "true" CRM solution.  The main things that I think are missing are: customizable reports (especially for tracking the sales pipeline), a strong email marketing component (I still need to use Mailchimp for direct email campaigns), and lack of a deep set of stock photos (I still need a Canva account).

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Thryv gives me one platform to manage all of my client-related issues, from initial lead generation to closing to managing clients to billing and accepting payments. The ability to do this all from one tool makes it very efficient for me to manage my time.

I enjoyed the support they provided when it came to social media management.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
Their SEO services. From the beginning, we asked about the SEO services and explained how important it would be for us to have that. However, once they built our website, we had another programmer review it and they stated that it was not good for SEO. We felt as if things weren't as transparent as they should have been. Also, the lack of a paper contract made things confusing.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
They mentioned that they would look into adding more features to the CRM feature because as of right now, it was hard to do much reporting on it.

all_reviews.review_title: It's a great small business CRM with some marketing functions.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
The customer service is great. No long waits or bot conversations. What I like about THYRV is you can request software enhancements to meet your business needs. I've requested at least 5 and they all have been completed.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
THRYV isn't the issue but the users must try to remember this is a out of the box software. Every quirk their company has will not be covered, but there is always a workaround. Or maybe it's time to change their process.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before THRYV we didn't have a place to see what is happening with a customer all in one place. This software has saved time and money. It's been very beneficial to see past-due customers all in one place. We also use THRYV Pay which saves the time of updating the customers account.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
Once you can get on Thryv with your local rep it is awesome, The customer service is great and the price is as well. We use Thryv to help our business get more leads, we have never been booked out for more than 2 weeks and with Thryv we are now booked out almost 6 weeks! The key here is to make sure you get in contact with your local rep instead of a phone salesmen. This is the only spot where I can see improvement because when I signed up with a phone rep the customer service wasn't great and I wasn't getting the value I wanted.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
Before I contacted my local rep, the customer service wasn't great and I didn't know how to use the product for the most part. The phone rep sold me the product and then left without another word, just left me to figure it out for the most part.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
They post on my social media page on a regular basis and they made a great website for me. This gives me more time to work on other more important things that I can't trust another company to do or it would be way to expensive to sub out.

all_reviews.review_title: A great all in one marketing tool for busines and management
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
The software enables you to create automatic publishing content and posts for your social media page handles. You can easily maintain multiple social media posts and multiple social media channels. This tool can perform various functionalities simultaneously, like generating invoices, quotation documents, and billings for sending to your customers and vendors. Easy integration with systems and OS, data can be accessed from anywhere easily. Sending payment notifications to your customers for fast payments.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
The software does not support storing and collecting the contact details of customers who visited your websites; you will need to install and integrate other third-party applications to make this happen.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
The software is helping us manage all our CRM data, marketing listing data, and social media content in one place. No data loss issue or missing personal contact issue is seen in this platform. My accounts management team and marketing are especially
using this platform, and they are happy as this tool helped them save time and easily manage all social media content and official documents so efficiently, analyzing and generating proper bills and invoices.

all_reviews.review_title: Thryv is not what they seem & once they have you in a contract won't care
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
When I was shopping around for CRM software to use, Thryv was in the top 2 companies. My favorite feature was that they claimed to be able to bill customers on auto-pilot each month. It was the top reason I went with them. We're a small company and couldn't afford to have to chase our payments each month. After signing up, and entering into the infamous 6 month contract, I discovered that it doesn't do that at all. The feature flat out doesn't work. I set up our first client to be billed twice a month, only to discover that the software didn't even attempt to charge him. So, I called in, and that is when I discovered that the normal customer service department DOESN'T handle anything that involves payments, and the payment department (they call it Thryv Pay) goes home at 3 PM SHARP.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
When I first signed up for Thryv, I was pitched the dream of how wonderful it was. I was sent emails, where they would offer me things like free t-shirts, free Amazon gift cards and even free services if I went and left a review for them. These offers came in fast after signing up, within the first week, and they kept coming. Go to G2 and leave a review and you'll get a free Amazon gift card, then a week later, go to another site and leave another review (you can even copy and paste your G2 review) and we'll send you a t-shirt. Then the big one came. We will give you a full video production package, send out a crew to you, we'll film you and your clients and edit the videos and give you 10 different versions of them IF you do a video review for us. All these came in the first 30 days of being with Thryv. This was before I even had an attempt to fully try out the software.

The person who works in billing and handles your account if you want to cancel is a piece of work. I went from dissatisfied to disgusted. Disgusted that I trusted this company with my time, my money and my energy. Now, I wish I never met them.

It's interesting, how companies that require a contract will tell you whatever they need to get your business, but as soon as you try to hold them to that it's "Well you have a 6-month contract, so you'll have to keep it another 3 months. It's written in the contract you signed." Okay, you're right. I signed a contract because I TRUSTED you when I clearly should not have. Now I have a 6-month contract for a CRM software that doesn't provide the service they "contracted" for.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
The reason I purchased Thryv and signed a contract with them is for the ability to use scheduled payments (auto billing), and it doesn't work. I can stick around and see if it gets better, but that would mean, I'd have to go in and schedule next month's payments for all my clients and PRAY that it works because if it doesn't 75% of my month's revenue will be lost until I can manually chase it down.  Or I could test it out again, and put only one client in the system and PRAY that one works, but if it doesn't work, I will have to wait another month to test another one. Such a waste of time.

Thryv is creating more problems than it is solving. I was prepared to chalk it up as a learning experience, and just walk away, but when I tried to cancel, I was told. "Well, we've given you credits in the last 3 months, so you've only paid for one month, and therefore you'll have to keep it until after your Sept payment (3 months away)".  Oh, I see, so even though you've wasted my time, energy and resources for 3 months, and the software doesn't do what you told me it would do, I'm required to keep paying for it, even though you know it is providing no benefit to me and my small business? So, I'll have to keep paying for your software and also go out and find a solution to solve the problem I hired you guys for? Therefore taking away even more revenue from my small business? Yeah, that sounds like a great deal.

Set the correct expectations for the things you are looking to accomplish

Made me look flashy in my text follow ups instead of just having a basic text. If the customer did receive the notification then they were more likely to sit. Most of the time however they didn't receive any notification

all_reviews.review_title: Exceptional Company, however they have a ways to go to truly support the solopreneur/entrepreneur!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
Customer service! You can get help 24/7 from knowledgeable and dependable representatives. If they can't answer your question they submit it and get back to you. Very rare to see that anymore!

What do you dislike about Thryv?
The main downside to using Thryv is that it is not all intuitive. There have been some actions I have flat out not been able to figure out and had to contact support. There are a couple that I still haven't figured out and there are several things I enjoyed at the previous CRM I had that Thryv does not do, and I am missing being able to accomplish what I need to like I did with my previous CRM.

Recommendations to others considering Thryv:
Sign-up sooner than later. While I was able to transfer client's information to Thryv, for the most part, but none of the historical information from my previous CRM was transferred so I had to manually transfer that information, for over 600 contacts! So switch sooner rather than later! Also, make a list of all the things you love at your current CRM and ask if those are available with Thryv. I miss several things that I loved but didn't ask about. And finally, TAKE YOUR TIME! This program is SO powerful don't try to absorb everything in one shot. Take it in slowly and keep a list of questions to ask the next time you meet with a rep. The reps are VERY knowledgable and if they don't know the answers they find out. So take it slow and easy!

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
The main problem Thryv is solving is the ease for my clients to pay online. I was hoping for better tracking of interactions with my clients but, some things are missing to make that possible.

all_reviews.review_title: Thryv CRM Is How You Scale a Thriving Business
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
There are so many integrated features and you can take the entire customer experience from prospect to sale, to servicing the customer, setting up online accounts, scheduling and invoicing all in one portal, organizing the "unorganizable" in this miraculous platform. But the best part is the simplicity. CRM nerds will love it but, it is SO simple, that even people who don't know CRM will instantly know how to use it. Oh yeah, then there is the customer support that they provide. Thryv seems to want to keep you on the long term so they help you with every detail, no matter what! Oh, did I mention I can plug in and sync to a ton of other apps like my Constant Contact? So many platforms can sync up!

What do you dislike about Thryv?
They really haven't left anything to dislike. They match up to so many needs it's hard to find anything lacking. If anything just continue to get more platforms that integrate and sync. Every once in a while I find an obscure one that I wish would sync up. But rearely.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Managing customer activity, not just on sales but making sure no one falls through the cracks! It's like a big customer files you can carry around with you, actually then thousands of them, no file cabinet required. It brings peace of mind and automates organizing all activity. WHen it comes time to service the customer, their entire history and profile is there with ALL data available at ALL times!

all_reviews.review_title: Surprised by the criticism- Thryv is exceptionally good
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
Going through a few critical reviews about Thryv on this forum has surprised me. Thryv is a cloud-based marketing and CRM software solution that expands the online presence of any business on its custom-tailored dashboard of leads and customers etc. This tool consolidates everything in one central location with three main focus points: CRM automation, marketing automation and invoicing. Their helpful customer support and implementation instructions are absolutely out of this world. Their regular and insightful social media posts and updates are always fantastic too.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
Thryv can be slightly expensive, especially for new kids on the block who may have thin organizational margins, but it's all worth it in the end. Otherwise, there are no dislikes to mention.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Thryv solved many issues for us while we used it. Thryv assisted in inflating our digital existence, developing client associations, and restructuring payment processing.

all_reviews.review_title: Thryv took the worry, complexity, and heavy-lifting off of my shoulders
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
Starting from the first meeting I had with Thryv, they broke away from the pack with their knowledge, professionalism, and their acute attention to wanting to better understand my business.  As a small business owner where every dollar and hour of the day matters, it's nice to feel like you have a partner and are not being treated as just another customer.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
I can honestly say from my experience to this point that nothing stands out that I dislike.  We're learning from each other along the way, so what matters most in a small business is responding when things aren't necessarily as expected.  Thryv acts very quickly on our feedback and requests so that their service becomes more and more as if we were doing this work ourselves.  It's like Thryv has become part of our staff.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
We needed to find other marketing and advertising options because our prior year's results were horrible, even after overspending the original marketing budget.  That's not acceptable, so we interviewed half a dozen agencies over the course of a few months to determine who best fit our needs and there was a consolidated model that would get us away from having six different logins to six different services and companies.  Thryv is able to address all six, however, we are only using them for five of those services at this point with plans to onboard the sixth later this year.  This represents a huge time saver by consolidating everything into a single login account and a reduction in overall spending and contract management with multiple agencies.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Thryv?

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
I do appreciate the ability to allow the program to post regularly. I appreciate the ease of connecting all of my social media, etc. Follow-up and setup were very good - good customer service and onboarding.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
The automatically generated content was often not applicable or incorrect about our specific fields or services. Adding photos to the posts took a lot of extra time, and eventually, we stopped doing that because it didn't seem very efficient.

Recommendations to others considering Thryv:
Consider your services first before using Thryv. It would help to make sure you have someone who can dedicate a good week or month to pre-scheduling all of your year's content, etc.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
I cannot personally speak to the CRM portion of the program, as we solely use this for social content and competition analysis (our scheduling software is where we have all of that information). I would be very interested if there was a condensed version of this program that would solely focus on Social media management and SEO analysis, etc. It could be an excellent tool for a smaller business with primarily simple, streamlined services.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Tool but Follow-Through Could be Better!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
I like the professionalism of the tool and its ease of use; we were looking for a CRM with the ability to invoice, collect payment and manage our online presence.  I love that we can do this all in 1 tool - saves me time and reduces headcount.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
Once you are all set up, I think it would be ideal to have a success partner touch base with you periodically to ensure things are working as intended and the tool is doing what it's supposed to do.  As a small business, it is hard to always be on top of everything, and while the tool helps facilitate the many hats an owner can wear, it can be easy to lose sight of how much ROI you are getting from such a significant investment.  Also, I think they could do a better job blocking out spam.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
TIME, the tool has allowed me to save time by creating a CRM tool to house and manage my client data.  It also allows me to present my company in a cohesive branded manner to my potential clients.

all_reviews.review_title: Thryv has made advertising and marketing my business so simple, I love it!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
Thryv has made advertising and marketing my business so simple; I love that I can do 99% of it from one place and have it take up a lot less of my time.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
The only problem I have had with Thryv is the amount of time it takes to get set up in certain things, without prior knowledge that it will take that long.  Ex. I signed up for them to do my website and wasn't told ahead of time that it would take a month to launch.  I understand WHY it took that long, but I would've liked to have been told, before signing, that I should expect that time frame.  Another example - when I signed up for ThryvPay, I was told it would hold the first payment for seven days.  However, nobody told me that it was seven BUSINESS days, and since Thanksgiving was in that timeframe, it was almost two whole weeks before I could access the payment made to me by a client.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Thryv has made advertising and marketing my business so simple by having everything in one place and allowing me to post on 5 of the social media platforms at once.  Thryv enables me to spend less time and worry on advertising/marketing my business and to focus more on my current clients as well as the leads I gain from this.

Thryv helps us keep all job and contact information in one place.  We have streamlined our estimating process to make it easier for our team members to invoice upon job completion.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
It would be really awesome if Thryv also had a time clock feature so that we did not need a separate app for that.  It would also be EXTREMELY beneficial if invoices could be routed to a different email address than the customer contact.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Job scheduling is easy.  We are able to communicate with our customers on their terms and have records of the conversation for reference.  The payments feature allows us to streamline our bookkeeping as well!

Thryv is exceptionally user-friendly and loaded with features to run my small business. I am still learning, but I love it so far. Ease of use and quality functionality is imperative for me.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
So far, the only thing that I have found that I don't like is that the app for Mac OS ends up going to a webpage rather than straight software (if that is the way to say it). If it goes to a browser than a website, I might as well do that and not use the app on my Mac.

Recommendations to others considering Thryv:
Consider the costs of all the separate programs, web services, and more. Then look at Thryv and the possibilities of saving so much money and so much less headache with everything all in one platform. I look forward to learning more on Thryv because I know it will simplify my life and my business operations. Money savings, time savings, and simplicity all increase the bottom line.

Having all of my daily tools in one place is fantastic. Collecting payment, client information, and marketing tools altogether.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
I started my insurance agency in October 2020.  Since I am a sole proprietor, I needed assistance in developing my CRM and especially in my with my social media presence.  Thryv and the staff have been exceptional in helping me with both.  It has also helped me stay in touch with my clients more.  I like the fact that I have everything on one dashbaord.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
It is a fairly steep learning curve for some of the functions.  I am not able to use an email more than once, and some of my clients are couples that only have one email for both of them.  I can personalize the database, but sometimes not quite as I want.  There are some things that are not as customizable as I would like, but it is very workable.

Recommendations to others considering Thryv:
Thryv is a great CRM for a small business, as everything is in one place.  I highly recommend it for a small business needing to centralize operations.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
I can post to all my social media pages at once.  Sending out announcements and greetings to my clients is very easy.  My birthday greetings are automatic.  My standings in Google have come up tremendously since I started with Thryv.

all_reviews.review_title: Why not just get one software?
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
I have everything I need in one software. I do not have to research (TIME) all these different companies (TIME) for a CRM, digital business card, google reviews, invoicing, and payments. This is a one-stop-shop  In addition, you have an actual person that will schedule zoom calls to help you navigate all the different tools and resources that Thryv offers.

I recently joined and they have added a ton of new resources that will not only help me with my business but I can share this with the small business owners I work with. I can tell them about how it has helped me and how it would benefit them. I am impressed with the constant communication and the flexibility to explain and help set up on their platform.

This has been one of the smartest decisions I have made for my business. I feel productive and organized.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
Trying to remember how to send a text VS an email. Talking with my Thryve support team today about that!

Recommendations to others considering Thryv:
Go through the training that is provided to you

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
I do not like to carry business cards.  This allows me to send my digital link which they can set up an appointment with me. Trying to stay organized is a strength I continually need to work on. This is solving that problem. Take little steps everyday.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
Thyv packages all the essentials for small business management in to one excellent bundle. Unlike many other tools of its kind, Thryv does it all, and all the parts work. I do not have to have a calendar account in one place, a billing account in another, and a social media service in yet another. It's ALL in Thryv. Plus, it is all customizable. So many other services make you squeeze into their paradigm of operation. Thryv stands above them all, making you the engineer of your business management tools. And Thryv's customer service is 100% human and real-time. No bots. No community boards. A real person is always there to help, and they will not give up until they resolve your issue, and you know what you need to know to keep rocking your biz management.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
I respect Thryv for even asking this question. That speaks volumes about their integrity. There are minor design elements that I'm not fond of, but they function just fine and do not impede my business workflow. Thryv staff has to handle some of the more complex website building, and I'd rather be able to do it myself, but in the big picture, it's a non-issue.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
The biggest thing I love about Thryv is the customizable social media posting. That I can post to LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram and Google business, and each at it's own day and time, either with Thryv's content (helpful when I'm super busy) or my own (excellent when I have the time), is unparalleled in the digital/social media CRM industry. It empowers me to keep a consistent social media presence with ease. And I can even tend to it remotely from my phone or tablet.

all_reviews.review_title: Investment in myself as well as my business.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
Automated reminders & asking for reviews... but honestly I LOVE Thryv!!!
I would gladly advertise on my car for Thryv, or even hand out business cards. (I know a lot of Licensed Massage Therapists)
I LOVE the ability to add tags on client charts!! It's super helpful!

What do you dislike about Thryv?
So much lag.
The app is super slow some (most) days. I had to invest in a desktop computer to get the full benefits as the app kept crashing on our phones.
Scaling back the price (maybe not charging extra for HIPPA privacy as it is a legal requirment anyways) would of course be appreciated!
But my #1 problem is the lag, specifically when working on the client list. It also makes you start back up at the top every time you go into
No option for tipping when taking payments is a real bummer. Especially when just receiving a good massage; you don't want to fight with your phone trying to pay 2 different ways.

Recommendations to others considering Thryv:
I definitely recommend having a computer set up PRIOR to signing up; mainly because Thryv makes it SO easy! You can hit the ground running same day if you have a few hours. This helps so much with most of the issues I am having.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Problems with appointment reminders and confirmation are my biggest benefits personally. Along with being able to sync/link everything!!(honestly my favorite part) This ability makes life so much easier, like night and day. It helps save money, time, and sanity having everything in one app/website.

all_reviews.review_title: Thryv has been great in helping us grow our client database as well and communicating offers to them
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
We use Thryv for several different things, the one that we see the most benefit from is the text marketing. We set it up so that people could opt in to receive "vip" offers and we have had several sales from that. We also use the Thryv to send happy birthday text messages and offer them 10% off on their orders and have had several orders come from that.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
The only issue that we've had is that our social media unlinked from Thryv and we had to re create a bunch of posts that we had scheduled. But now that they are posting again it's driving traction. The only other issue was that getting ahold of someone that in is the united states other than my rep seemed hard. And I personally struggle a little bit with understanding people with such strong accents.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
We struggled with the best way to communicate with our customers to keep them coming back and we are using Thryv to help with that. The other thing that Thryv has helped us with quite a bit is just staying organized. Without Thryv it would be much harder to manage the social media. Our goal with Facebook and Instagram is to get more followers and Iikes and manually going in to post on a regular basis is just something that takes a bunch of time so the Thryv automates that for us saving us a bunch of time.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
Thryvv's main selling point for my business was the client portal.  Being able to have all communication in one central location is essential when multiple hands touch one account.  The program allows us to remain engaged with the client's, allows us to share documents with client's as well as make the client's feel that they have a direct connection with our company.  I also like the all staff members can engage with Thryvv with questions or additional training.  The program is very user friendly and we were able to set our program up within minutes.  Having a social media integration is very important, we are able to view analytics and update content on all social media platforms in one location.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
I do not like that the program does not allow for tasking, email integration and more customized automation.  I would also like to see a place where staff can send messages to each other.  I would also like to implement a pipeline automation that client's can also review in the client portal that can let them know what stage their file is in.

Recommendations to others considering Thryv:
I would like Thryvv to take a deeper look at their competitor Keap.  I came from Keap, but the integration and automation that Keap has is amazing.   If we can have more automation and can add a way of assigning tasks and messaging with other staff members that would be great.  I would also like to have PayPal integrated with Thryvv.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our company is able to get up-to-date information on each client's file.  The client's are able to send documents and schedule appointments.  The feedback from client's has been very positive.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Software for a Small Business
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
The integration of critical small business tasks from a CRM to marketing efforts to invoicing is excellent.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
I wish there were more fields that could be customization for unique industries (i.e. I wish I could track pesticide usage on my appointments per government mandates, but only a select few businesses using Thryv would ever need this functionality; hence, it would be nice to have some customization fields)

Recommendations to others considering Thryv:
If you need one place to for a CRM, sales estimates/payments/receipts, control online presence, and handle basic scheduling tasks, Thryv is perfect for you.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Thryv controls all of my marketing efforts and the Thryv console helps me keep track of my social media marketing as well as all my other online presence.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Account executive -- Marketing and Sales Manager

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
I appreciate that all the moving parts for my online business are in all ONE spot! I've been using the platform for about a month and I feel really good about this decision to trust THRYV with this large undertaking! They have simplified my life so much, that I actually feel bad when I hear other practitioners struggling to get "stuff" done. It used to take me many hours to upload and update everything! Now it can done in a few hours, scattered through the week.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
Nothing so far, though - there's so much to learn, I've been trying to pace myself!

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Having all the branches of my business under one "roof"! I've learned some best practices in the area of marketing while browsing through the social media ads the team has put together. If I change the subject of the proposed marketing launch, the team sees it and their focus shifts too!

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Founder, Artist Practitioner, Veriditas Trained Labyrinth Facilitator, Lightworker

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
I have been very happy with every person who I have worked with at Thryv! Changing services can be difficult but they have make it very smooth.  They answer my question quickly and always go above my expectations! I started at one level and have continued to add services because of the quality of the product. When I decided to change my website over I was working real time with the web designer and my sales people to make changes. This efficient and I loved the input of all these talented people. This has happened several times as I add services so the team approach has been great!

What do you dislike about Thryv?
The software can be limiting and not as flexible as I would like sometimes. I have found that a little frustrating but each time I have had help to better learn the software.I have a better understand of how to best use the products to my advantage. However, it seems like the company is growing and working very hard to be a perfect solutions for business owners.

Recommendations to others considering Thryv:
Go for it!  It's been a great experience for me.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
The biggest problem I have solved is not wasting time on issues I can't solve by myself.  I enjoy teaching myself but once I'm stuck it can really take a lot of my time trying to solve issues .  So having again people 24/ 7  - 7 days a week to help is wonderful!  I have been able to have several features in one place that were previously in other apps. It's also low rick as I decided to pay month to month. That makes me very happy!

The CRM is very easy to use, cost-efficient, and has been exceptionally helpful in saving me time by handling my online directory listings.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
I dislike that the email automation is coupled with the social media marketing package. I feel that these could be separated, as I'm interested in the email automation but not the social media portion of the package.

Recommendations to others considering Thryv:
If you are a small business in the process of figuring it out, but don't have much time, this software is a great, affordable way to tackle the bookkeeping side of things to free up extra time at an affordable price.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Thryv has thoroughly simplified my bookkeeping process and has driven multiple leads to my google simply by taking care of my local listings. I'm now able to spend more time enhancing my clients experience and creating content, instead of spending hours making adjustments to listings.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Thryv?
review_question_answers.answer: No  ability to collect a deposit.  Currently have to invoice for 50% deposit and then create another invoice to collect the remaining balance.
