review_question_answers.answer:
Estimating. Invoicing.  Tracking payments.

Everything being in one place is awesome!

all_reviews.review_title: thryv is a great multimedia marketing system and CRM.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
I like being able to put my information in once and it gets entered into all search engines and much more.  Using the online marketing program has been great as well.  I love to do campaign marketing because I can share blog that I found interesting that my clients may like.  It is a very good tool to have for any business.  This program also gives me the ability to message my clients/leads from one location as well.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
Right now I don't really like the leads program.  I am not getting any very good leads from it.  The leads that I have received called about a business that I did not have, for instance, I got a call one time where the person thought I was a roofing company.  I don't see where I would have been very much help there.

Recommendations to others considering Thryv:
If you want to get yourself out there on all the search engines and more with your information, then Thryv is the way to go.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
I like being able to fix a monthly newsletter (you can do one how often you want) and schedule it for when I want it to go out.  Another system that I was using (can't remember what it was called at the moment) had the online newsletter available but they did not populate search engines and social media with my business information.  This has been the best program that I have ever used for my business.

all_reviews.review_title: Thryv software for managing your business and internet marketing is a good choice.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
The thryv software makes a great CRM for small service businesses. It is very useful for small independent businesses that have a fair amount of customer contact were keeping track of products and services. The software is also a good internet marketing platform for businesses to be found, grow and prosper on the internet. The best feature is the price which is much less than anything I have found on the market for what all it does.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
For me, the billing integration was a little cumbersome because I already had a good billing and banking option in use so that feature I did not need to use.

Recommendations to others considering Thryv:
If you are looking for business solutions for your business you should consider Thryv because it is a great CRM to organize most of your business functions. Internet marketing functions are great to be found in 60 listing and citations, great customer review and social media posting and monitoring features. They also have great customer service and the price is very reasonable for all that you get. So give them a look in your automation search and get a product demo is the only real way to see all that they have to offer.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
I help me organize my business with great CRM features that are fairly easy to use. The Citations and listings are very easy to set up and that makes it easy to be found online. The review and social media posting features make being found and getting reviewed by customers easy. The customer service is great. They are there 24/7 to answer any questions you have. They will do a zoom call and help you set up any feature on their system. They also have a great getting started program the get your CRM and internet marketing set up with you.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
What I like best above Thryv is that it is an easy system to navigate.  The upside of using Thryv is that it has impressed my clients time after time.  My clients love that we use Thryv as a business.  We are able to send out holiday messages at a time that is more convenient for the business.  Having the access to Social Media Post at our finger tips and we schedule these ahead of time.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
I would not really say dislike, however; when I came on board the collaboration with Square has just taken place the same day.   Trying to sync all my clients from Square to Thryv was a little frustrating, but, that process has been completed and we are fully operating in Thryv.

Recommendations to others considering Thryv:
Don't wait to start using Thryv once you have enrolled in the CRM.  Start using Thryv immediately for better use of system.  The support team is always available.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
One of our greatest benefits with Thryv is time saving.  We are now able to devote time and energy to other parts of our business to generate more business.  The ease of setting appointments, reminders and receiving Google reviews has mad a large positive impact on our business.  We are happy to have Thryv as our primary CRM.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent resources for Brand Awareness and Customer Relationship Management
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
The most helpful aspects to using Thryv are related to its integration between the website and customer engagement including the customer portal. Simply put the ability to run  a targeted campaign from clients already managed within the CRM and continue to engage with the customer through the use of the portal is a high value for customer retention.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
Thryv is fantastic as a concise set of tools to facilitate and manage your online presence, but you must be proactively involved with the content creators and designers or you may not be satisfied with your website. To be clear you need to have a good idea of the information your website needs to convey for your business. Thryv team members will be more than willing to assist you in putting the gathered information on the site. They can't create that information for you, but this is normal to those with a well curated online presence.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Thryv has allowed us to provide information to our potential customers in a professional, graphically pleasing and easy to use design providing the customers with a facile and industry standard online experience.

all_reviews.review_title: Delighted with the product and the service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
I like the all-in-one approach of Thryv.  I can easily move from CRM, to announcements, to invoice, to calendar, to reviews, etc.  No need to switch platforms or programs.  Makes it easy to see all customer interactions and conversations in one place.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
Very little to dislike. One feature I have mentioned to my local business advisor is the ability to add more than one attachment to a message or an invoice.  For example, I would like to be able to add an invoice and an expense report and receipt to a client at the same time.  Seems awkward to send them multiple messages.

Recommendations to others considering Thryv:
Just do it - use whichever features are most applicable to your business

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
increasing online presence; communication with customers and potential clients; ease of invoicing.

I think what makes Thryv the best is that it is all inclusive of what I feel a small business would need to stay organized and up to date.  You can store client information, keep information on billings or invoicing, but you can also create marketing campaigns and keep all parts of your business current and fresh.  It is also very user friendly and very easy to find what you need without making any mistakes.  I also like that it includes an appointment scheduling aspect to it so clients can reach out and make an appointment with the company I work for and it emails us to let us know.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
I cannot find one thing I dislike about this software.

Recommendations to others considering Thryv:
none at this time

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
The problem I am solving with Thryv is that I am able to keep all my contacts in one place and they are very accessible.  I am also able to update things on my own that before I was not able to and I had to go through a third party to be able to make company info changes.  Now I can make these updates myself.

all_reviews.review_title: This product is very easy to use.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
I love the website builder in Thryv. It is really easy to navigate and figure out how to add pictures and text boxes to your website. There is also a little box that pops up in the window you're working in that has shortcuts to change things like the font, size, bold or italic. Additionally, there is a lot of customer support and if you can't figure something out yourself, help is only a click or call away.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
I think that the price point is a little high, thankfully for me it is bundled into my existing marketing campaign with DexYP.

Recommendations to others considering Thryv:
Consider the amount of time you will save by not having to figure out how to build your site.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
My customers are able to call me, make appointment, and send me emails through my website. They are also now able to text my business phone that is actually a land line. It is very simple for me to post an update or make changes to my website and I can have it done in less than 5 minutes without having to be on someone else's schedule.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
The general idea of Thryv is good. You should be able to use it to better reach your customers through things like social media and email campaigns. It took a long time to get up and running but, for our company, probably the most helpful part about the program was that they handled our social media posting.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
From my understanding Thryv is mostly a CRM platform. I say "from my understanding" because NO ONE is helpful within this company. It's parent company, DexYP, sells pretty much everything by confusing it's customers. This particular piece of the package (Thryv) sold to our company was given to me to oversee. It was a complete waste of money. The one feature we found useful, the social media posting, wasn't even great. There were many posts that were duplicated throughout the year, and even one entire month of posts that was copy and pasted from a previous month (you have a calander on Thryv's platform that you can review the scheduled posts before they go out for the month, so this was caught before the posts were made). I honestly wish I could give a better review as to why this was so bad, but there was so little we were able to utilize within Thryv that I don't have much feedback to give. Confusing and a waste of money.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
Thryv didn't actually help solve any problems for us.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
I love that we can contact customers through their cell phone using the internet, As a small company in a very rural area, our cell signal is sparse. However, many customers love getting a text message reminder of their appointment. This program allows us to meet our customers where they are despite our location limitations.

What do you dislike about Thryv?
The "Client Search" bar can be a bit of a hassle. I tend to get several customers in the search results that do not meet what I have searched while the customer I am looking for and meets the search exactly might be overlooked or very low on the list.

Recommendations to others considering Thryv:
Ask for a free trial period to see if this program is right for you.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are now able to contact a large group of customers based on the type of service we provide for them quickly and easily. Using the "tags" feature I can pull those up with just a push of a button. I can also send them reminders that their service is due using the email and text message Campaign feature.

What do you dislike about Thryv?

This is an amazing product for industries working direct with individuals and clients, like real estate, direct sales and service, electricians, plumbers, etc. It may be a little harder to use for b2b type project, but we have found it to be still very workable - and will be watching to see as this platform improves, as it already has several times. all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Thryv?
Thryv allows your business, school, etc. connect to the public with ease. Instead of posting to each social media website individually, you can send posts instantly through Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and more! Moreover, for those who wish to send text messages to all of their contacts, Thryv is perfect!

What do you dislike about Thryv?
It is difficult for international clients to join our Thryv contacts, so they're unable to receive text message alerts. Also, if you like to post interactive content on social media sites, Thryv doesn't allow that. I love sending polls instead of just seeing what people comment, but to do that, I have to create a poll in each social media platform individually.

What problems is Thryv solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Thryv to send reminders and alerts to our contacts and to monitor our social media interaction. I love that Thryv has a graphic breakdown of how our social media posts are faring with the public as well as a way to respond to comments.
